snippet: Nazr Mohammed was ejected in the first half of Friday night’s loss to Miami after shoving LeBron James, leaving the already undermanned Chicago Bulls with seven players.
abstract: Chicago Bulls reserve center Nazr Mohammed is ejected in first half of Bulls loss to Miami Heat after shoving LeBron James, leaving already undermanned Chicago with seven players.
lead_paragraph: Nazr Mohammed was ejected in the first half of Friday night’s loss to Miami after shoving LeBron James, leaving the already undermanned Chicago Bulls with seven players.

headline.seo: N.B.A. Playoffs — The Bulls’ Short Bench Got Shorter in Game 3
headline.main: Ejection Shows Bulls Have Fight and Spirit, but Little Margin for Error
headline.print_headline: Ejection Shows Bulls Have Plenty of Spirit but Little Margin for Error
